name: The Obscure Naturalist
description:
The Obscure Naturalist is a text adventure created with STAC.

The game is set in the early summer and at the start you are sitting on the head wall of a dam enjoying the nature. Suddenly a large and very rare Heron flies over your head. You follow it's flight with your binoculars and you see that it has a nest and young chicks. If you could get a close-up picture of them it would make you world famous. The aim of the game is to get to the island where the nest is and take that photo.

shot.caption: This is what you see when you start
